title: Project Details
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.

share.noShares: No shares for this project yet.
share.internalSharingDescription: Share this project with other registered users by email.

external.title: External Share Links
external.description: Create and manage public, password-protected links to share your project.
external.noLinks: No public share links created yet.

assembly_importer.noAssemblies: No assemblies available. Create one in Resources.

analytics.title: Project Analytics
analytics.chartTooltip: This chart visualizes the distribution of costs within your project.
analytics.projectCostTooltip: This chart compares the total cost of different projects, broken down by category.
analytics.costBreakdownTooltip: This chart shows the breakdown of costs by category for the selected project(s).
analytics.missingRatesWarning: Missing exchange rates for: {{currencies}}. Some conversions may be inaccurate.

profit_pricing.title: Profit & Pricing Summary
profit_pricing.overheadDesc: Additional costs not directly tied to production.
profit_pricing.markupDesc: Profit margin added to the project cost.

tooltips.overhead: Overhead is calculated as a percentage of the total direct costs.
tooltips.contingency: Contingency is calculated as a percentage of the total direct costs to cover unexpected expenses.
tooltips.markup: Markup is applied as a percentage of the Prime Cost (Direct Costs + Overhead + Contingency) to determine the profit margin.
tooltips.subtotal: The subtotal before tax is the sum of the Prime Cost and the Markup.
tooltips.tax: Taxes are applied as a percentage of the Subtotal (Before Tax).
tooltips.grandTotal: The Grand Total is the final price including all direct costs, overhead, contingency, markup, and taxes.

comments.title: Comments for {{item}}
comments.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to add one!
